attributes.description:
For more information on this vehicle please contact 0872502162. WARRANTY VALID UNTIL 2024 OR 120 000 KM'S. 
PURCHASE THIS 2021 VOLKSWAGEN POLO VIVO 1.4 TRENDLINE 5 DOOR NOW! THE 1.4 LITRE ENGINE PRODUCES 55 KW OF POWER AND 130 NM OF TORQUE. THE POWER IS DRIVEN BY THE FRONT WHEELS. IT HAS A 5 SPEED MANUAL GEARBOX. IT REACHES A TOP SPEED OF 171 KM/H. IT HAS MANUFACTURERS' CLAIMED FUEL CONSUMPTION FIGURES OF 5.7 LITRES PER 100 KM. THIS VEHICLE IS THE PERFECT RUNABOUT VEHICLE TO PERFORM ALL YOUR DAILY TASKS AS IT IS FUEL EFFICIENT BUT ALSO FEELS QUITE GOOD TO DRIVE. IT IS COMFORTABLE AND THE TURNING RATIO OF THE STEERING WHEEL IS GREAT FOR THIS HATCHBACK. IT IS PERFECT AS YOU CAN COPE BETTER WITH THE EVER INCREASING FUEL COSTS.



ALL PRE-OWNED VEHICLES UNDERGO A STRINGENT AA MULTI-POINT CHECK AND AA ROADWORTHY BEFORE DELIVERY. WE DELIVER COUNTRYWIDE AND IT GETS EVEN BETTER, WE COME TO YOU. FINANCE AVAILABLE AND A TEST DRIVE IS A MUST. PRICE EXCLUDES LICENSE REGISTRATION, ADMINISTRATION, DELIVERY, AND ON THE ROAD FEES. *ERRORS AND OMISSIONS EXCEPTED
